meanings.definition: In a manner that is functioning or working effectively.
meanings.sent1: The machine was operatively running, producing goods efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The computer system was operatively connected to the main server.
meanings.sent3: The robot operatively danced around the factory floor, entertaining the workers.
meanings.sent4: The plan was operatively executed, leading to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The engine operatively hummed along, powering the entire vehicle smoothly.

meanings.definition: In a way that is actively in operation or use.
meanings.sent1: The security cameras were operatively monitoring the premises for any suspicious activity.
meanings.sent2: The new software was operatively installed on all company computers.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels operatively gathered nuts for the upcoming winter, working together efficiently.
meanings.sent4: The clock operatively ticked away the seconds, marking the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The traffic lights operatively regulated the flow of vehicles, preventing chaos on the roads.
